src/elements/Drawer.js
Drawer
description:
This is the Chunky Web Navigation Drawer that is usually used with a navigator
 to control opening and closing the drawer.

name: constructor
description:
An instance of this class represents a Navigation Drawer element that
 is meant to be displayed as an overlay on top of the visible window. The drawer
 takes a list of menu items as input and displays them using a default
 style can be overwritten. It can also be closed and opened.

unknown.tagValue: The Drawer element to be used in a navigation menu

params.name: props.menu
params.description: a list of menu items to display

params.name: props.menu.title
params.description: the title of a menu item

params.name: props.open
params.description: whether the Drawer is open or closed

params.name: props.onClose
params.description: called when the Drawer is closed

name: _onClosePressed
description: Will be called when the drawer is closed *

name: _open
description: Whether the drawer is meant to be displayed as open or closed

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} whether the drawer is open or closed, false by default

return.description: whether the drawer is open or closed, false by default

name: _headerStyle
description:
Uses the given style or a default one if one wasn't passed through the properties.
 Override this if you want to completely take over the header style.

unknown.tagValue: {Array<Object>} a list of passed menu objects, or an empty list

return.description: a list of passed menu objects, or an empty list

name: _onClose
description: Called when the drawer is asked by the user to close

name: renderMenu
description: Renders a list o menu items, as
